Go beat the hell out of them. The writers. Those hacks. Threaten them. Extort them. Those still on their feet -- the most sanctimonious and hypocritical -- them, you give brown envelopes. (she points at brown envelopes stacked on the table)
You thought I’d pack a suit case and go -- Yes? FERRARI nods.
It crossed my mind --
It crossed my mind, too --
You’re financing this?
Lending it.
And the conditions are?
No conditions. (pause)
There is no condition. You have the money. (she pauses)
